Uses of Interface
net.tvburger.jdl.model.nn.NeuralNetwork

Packages that use NeuralNetwork
Package
Description
net.tvburger.jdl.adaline
Provides the implementation of Bernard Widrow and Ted Hoff's ADALINE (1960)
net.tvburger.jdl.cnn
 
net.tvburger.jdl.mlp
Implementation of the MultiLayer Perceptron
net.tvburger.jdl.model.nn
Defines the neural network as specialization of an estimation function
net.tvburger.jdl.model.nn.training.initializers
Defines the neural network initialization algorithms
net.tvburger.jdl.model.nn.training.optimizers
Contains the neural network optimizer algorithms
net.tvburger.jdl.perceptron
Provides the implementation of Frank Rosenblatt's Perceptron (1958)

    Called when entering a specific layer in the network.
    default void
    NeuronVisitor.enterNetwork(NeuralNetwork neuralNetwork)
    Called when entering the entire network before any layers or neurons are visited.
    default void

    Called after all neurons in a specific layer have been visited.
    default void
    NeuronVisitor.exitNetwork(NeuralNetwork neuralNetwork)
    Called after all layers and neurons have been visited in the network.
    default void

    Called when visiting a connection (synapse) between two neurons.
    default void
    NeuronVisitor.visitNeuron(NeuralNetwork neuralNetwork, Neuron neuron, int layerIndex, int neuronIndex)
